    • Method Detail

      • RowCount

        public static int RowCount(java.lang.String tableName)
        This function counts the number of rows in a given table in the postgre SQL database
        Parameters:
        tableName - The table whose rows must be counted
        Returns:
        Returns the number of rows in the table
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when the given table does not exist

      • EditAttribute

        public void EditAttribute(java.lang.String tableName,
                          java.lang.String columnName,
                          java.lang.String ID,
                          java.lang.String newValue)
        Edit an attribute for an ID in the specified table
        Parameters:
        tableName - The table name to execute the query on
        columnName - The attribute name to edit
        ID - The ID of the row to query for
        newValue - The new value for the attribute

      • AddTableEntry

        public void AddTableEntry(java.lang.String tableName,
                          java.lang.String... attributes)
        Adds a new entry to a table
        Parameters:
        tableName - The table to execute the query on
        attributes - The values of the attributes of the new entry in the table. The values should be listed in the same order that they appear in the table

      • getStringMatrix

        public java.lang.String[][] getStringMatrix(java.lang.String tableName,
                                            java.lang.String... attributes)
        Executes a query and returns the result as a String matrix
        Parameters:
        tableName - The table to execute the query on
        attributes - The list of attributes to query on The attributes that will be pulled from the table
        Returns:
        Returns a 2D Array of Strings where each row is a row returned by the query and the columns are in the order they appeared in the attributes varargs.
